prompts: Show me an electric-type Pokemon that can generate powerful thunderbolts and has a playful personality.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a mouse but has a striking yellow and brown color scheme.
Create a whimsical creature that embodies the spirit of electricity with a cheerful demeanor.
Imagine a Pokemon that can harness lightning, with a round body and long, curled tail.
Give me a cute yet fierce Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and loves to explore.
Generate a Pokemon with a vibrant yellow hue and a strong connection to its electrical powers.
Make a character that represents speed and agility, with a sleek, bipedal form.

distinctive_features: Curled tail with a lightning bolt shape
